title: 820-01598-06 No Key light and webcam not work
message:
Before is my customer change LCD screen not correct model so key light and webcam is not work.
Now I changed with original screen but it still not work webcam and key light.
Please you help me.
Thank you!

title: 820-01598-06 No Key light and webcam not work
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum.
Ambient Light Sensor (ALS) problem; it is place on webcam board.
New chinese LCD assemblies don't have it installed.
Check if L8504 is not burnt.

title: 820-01598-06 No Key light and webcam not work
message:
Yes I'm checked L8504 is not burnt .
And I test with Original screen take from other Macbook it not work the same.
So it has problem with motherboard or other problem Sir?

title: 820-01598-06 No Key light and webcam not work
message:
The LCD assemly works perfect in other MacBook?
Why was changed original LCD?

title: 820-01598-06 No Key light and webcam not work
message:
Before is I think this problem is from LCD and I tested with original Screen full set it still the same problem.
The LCD Assembly is works perfect in other Macbook.

title: 820-01598-06 No Key light and webcam not work
message:
Is not clear why the client changed the LCD?
Very likely he did something wrong; like knocked off component, or broken trace.
Maybe didn't disconnect the battery first...
